name: Build On BNB
description: Meme created by Binance in an interaction with the Binance intern. they asked the community to name their mascot and confirmed the name as bob. his instructions were to make bsc great again. This is BOB Bob wants to build on bnb. build with bob. be great and make bsc great again. Binance wants BNB on the BNB CHAIN ​​network. We are basically $BOB standing on the BNB chain, so this makes sense given their desire to build $BOB on their own BNB chain. Let's wake up and prove that what they want is us!
